bActive: Whether this actor is active and to be recorded when the 'Record' button is pressed.
bCreateLevelSequence: Whether to create a level sequence for this actor recording
TargetLevelSequence: The level sequence to record into
TargetName: Optional target name to record to. If not specified, the actor label will be used
TakeNumber: Specify the take number for the new recording
bSpecifyTargetAnimation: Whether we should specify the target animation or auto-create it
TargetAnimation: The target animation we want to record to
AnimationSettings: The settings to apply to this actor's animation
bRecordToPossessable: Whether to record to 'possessable' (i.e. level-owned) or 'spawnable' (i.e. sequence-owned) actors. Defaults to the global setting.
ActorToRecord: The actor we want to record
